entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is trying to wake up and is surrounded by dementors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is trying to fool Hermione with a spell.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as creatures that surround Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: geminio
entities.description: Geminio is a spell cast by Harry to replicate the locket.

entities.name: relashio
entities.description: Relashio is a spell cast by Hermione to fool Mrs. Cattermole.

entities.name: patronuses
entities.description: Patronuses are mentioned as a way for Harry and Hermione to get out of the room with dementors outside.

entities.name: stags
entities.description: Stags are mentioned as creatures that can be used as patronuses.

entities.name: mrs. cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is a person who is frightened and needs to leave the room with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: chair
entities.description: A chair is mentioned as something that dementors are hiding in.

relationships.description: Harry helps Hermione by casting a spell to fool her.
Harry defends against dementors with his patronus.
